mapper.select: SELECT fUuid AS "uuid", fTerminalType AS "terminalType", fKeyword AS "keyword", fTitle AS "title", fUrl AS "url", fDesc AS "desc", fPosition AS "position", fUpdateTime AS "updateTime", fCreateTime AS "createTime" FROM t_fumian_list f WHERE 1 = 1 AND f.fKeyword like '%${negativeListCriteria.keyword}%' AND f.fUrl like '%${negativeListCriteria.url}%' ORDER BY f.fCreateTime DESC
